scripts.build: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.build:osx: electron-packager ./app "Monstercat Connect Desktop (Unofficial)" --out=dist/osx/ --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.36.3 --icon=assets/osx/mount.icns && npm run rearrange:osx
scripts.build:win: electron-packager ./app "Monstercat Connect Desktop (Unofficial)" --out=dist/win/ --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.36.3 --icon=assets/win/icon.ico && npm run rearrange:win
scripts.rearrange:win: mv "./dist/win/Monstercat Connect Desktop (Unofficial)-win32-ia32/"* ./dist/win/ && rm -rf "./dist/win/Monstercat Connect Desktop (Unofficial)-win32-ia32/"
scripts.rearrange:osx: mv "./dist/osx/Monstercat Connect Desktop (Unofficial)-darwin-x64/"* ./dist/osx/ && rm -rf "./dist/osx/Monstercat Connect Desktop (Unofficial)-darwin-x64/"
scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
scripts.pack:osx: npm run build:osx && electron-builder "dist/osx/Monstercat Connect Desktop (Unofficial).app" --platform=osx --out="dist/osx" --config=packager.json
